Key Match Events: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 73 runs
Pathum Nissanka scored a half-century with 54 runs
Dunith Wellalage took 3 wickets in the match
Maheesh Theekshana took 7 wickets in the match
Asitha Fernando took 12 wickets in the match
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat
Sri Lanka's openers set the tone for the innings
West Indies struggled with the turn and bounce of the pitch
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka said it's an important win for Sri Lanka and credits Dunith Wellalage's performance
Rovman Powell said they did well to keep Sri Lanka down to 160 and will reflect on their mistakes
Pathum Nissanka, Man of the Match, had a special plan against the spin bowlers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla
The match started on Tuesday, 15 October 2024, at 7:00 PM (IST)
